msg: At least warn when namespace configuration fails
as otherwise all kinds of meaningful exception might

author: ozeigermann
msg: Made authentication header that is set when the need for reauthentication is indicated by UnauthenticatedException

author: ozeigermann
msg: Warn in case creation of a path mapper failed

author: ozeigermann
msg: Prevented multiple calls to enlist in case of failure as it simply makes no sense

msg: - Augmented BasicWebdavStore with authentication checking to allow forcing of (re-)authentication from the store level
- Added option to use a factory for store instance creation
